comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content:
Audience comments from the Caribbean Photographic Memories session, Leeds West Indian Centre, October 2013:

Irma Heyliger, who is from St Kitts, commented that the wooden houses shown are gone now, replaced by more modern buildings. Paul Auber commented that many of the house styles in the Caribbean, with shutters resembled those found in Sierra Leone and other ex-colonial African towns.
